pattern.name: mobile_first_media_query
pattern.description: Start with base styles for mobile, then use min-width media queries for larger screens.
pattern.explanation: Always write mobile styles first, then layer on enhancements for larger screens.

pattern.name: responsive_grid_layout
pattern.description: Use CSS Grid or Flexbox for adaptive layouts.
pattern.explanation: Grids adapt to screen size, improving usability and aesthetics.

pattern.name: accessible_button_component
pattern.description: Accessible button with keyboard and ARIA support (React example).
pattern.explanation: Use semantic elements and ARIA attributes for accessibility.

pattern.name: svg_asset_usage
pattern.description: Import and use SVG assets as React components.
pattern.explanation: SVGs scale cleanly and are easy to style for modern UIs.
